$WmMPID_お茶会ティルテュ,ch06_08_Tailto_F_Teatime23,Face|Mercedes, we need another serving
of tea! Quickly!$k$p$WmMPID_メルセデス,ch06_06_Ira_FF_Pair,Face|All right. I will get the water boiling
as soon as I can!$k$p$WmMPID_お茶会シグルド,ch06_04_Siglud_M_Teatime23,Face|Ayra, will you take these treats
to that table? I'm carrying this,
if you'd come with me...$k$p$WmMPID_双界アイラ,ch06_06_Ira_FF_Pair,Face|Hrm... Three plates? All right...
Hold one out in my hand, balance
one on my wrist, and the last one...$k$pThere. This ought to work.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_メルセデス,ch06_06_Ira_FF_Pair,Face|You're amazing, Ayra! You serve
with such speed and grace, it's like
nothing I've seen before.$k$p$nMPID_双界アイラ|Oh? This is all new to me, but I'm
glad to hear I'm being of use.$k$p$Sbs150|
